welcome:
🎓 Welcome to University Announcement Bot!

You will receive updates automatically for all announcements.
Categories include: #sports, #academic, #tech, #events, #general, #important
commands:
📌 Available commands:
/myid - Get your Telegram ID
/getannouncements - Get last 5 announcements
/announce - Create announcement (admin only)
/addadmin - Add new admin (admin only)
/lang - Change language
announcement_attachments_prompt:
📎 You can now send photos or documents (optional).
Send your attachments one by one or click "Done" if you don't want to add any.
